```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(car)

library(reshape2)


theme_set(theme_bw())

kam <- read.table("Data/kambala.csv", sep = ",", header = T, dec = ".")



```


```{r}
kam_mean <- kam %>% group_by(Bay, Sex, Sidedness) %>% summarise(Mean = mean(L), SE = sd(L)/sqrt(n()), Min = min(L), Max =max(L) )



kam_mean$Output <- with(kam_mean, paste(round(Mean, 1), "±", round(SE, 2), "(", Min,"-", Max, ")" ))

kam_mean_print <- kam_mean %>% select(Bay, Sex, Sidedness, Output)

kam_mean_print$Bay <- gsub(kam_mean_print$Bay, pattern = "_", replacement = " ")

```


```{r}
kable(kam_mean_print, col.names = c("Bay", "Sex", "Orientation", "Mean ± SE (Min - Max)"))
```
